item.title: Random Forest
item.description: If you know how decision tree works, random forest will be very straightforward to understand. Random forest is just a collection of randomly generated decision trees where each decision tree makes his own prediction. Random forest combines the predictions of individual trees and takes either the majority or the average of all predictions as his output. item.title: Brief Introduction to Decision Trees
